channel.title: CVE Feed for Škoda -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Škoda -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-28899|2024-08-02T13:51:39.129Z -- %C5%A1koda -- superb%20iii
item.description: By sending a specific reset UDS request via OBDII port of Skoda vehicles, it is possible to cause vehicle engine shutdown and denial of service of other vehicle components even when the vehicle is moving at a high speed. No safety critical functions affected.
